overview: A group of people who come from the countryside to the capital in search of a source of livelihood, including (Shbara), who works as a car caller, gets to know (Inshirah), and they fall in love. (Shbara)’s boss wants (Inshirah) for himself, so he plots to keep him away from her. At the same time (Ainu) deceives the boss's daughter, robs her of her honor, and refuses to marry her, and the conflict continues.
title: Everyday's Game
